definition: prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
stripes of a tiger/"tiger" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 141)
subjugated people/refugee from a destroyed country

expel the Manchu, revolutionary slogan from around 1900

sentences.english: In addition Krupp thousand men and women who, three thousand cattle horses.
sentences.chinese: 此外虏男女一万二千人，牛马三万余匹。

sentences.english: The natives thought the explorer was possessed by a fiend.
sentences.chinese: 当地人认为，这个冒险家被一个魔鬼虏去了。
